title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Whisk eggs and cheese.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture quickly.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish with marinated chicken in a spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake the chicken.
Prepare the tomato sauce with spices.
Combine chicken with the sauce and simmer.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings and a zesty sauce.
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Assemble tacos with beef and toppings.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chocolate chip cookies with a chewy center and crispy edges.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine both mixtures and fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Cool on wire rack before serving.

title: Caesar Salad
description: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and delicious avocado toast topped with cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Top with halved cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
Serve immediately.
